header.title: wxAuiManagerEvent

description.p: Event used to indicate various actions taken with wxAuiManager.
See wxAuiManager for available event types.
This class is derived (and can use functions) from: wxEvent

section.title: Events
section.p: Use wxEvtHandler:connect/3 with wxAuiManagerEventType to subscribe to events of this type.

func.fsummary: Sets the wxAuiManager this event is associated with.

desc.p: Sets the wxAuiManager this event is associated with.
Return: The wxAuiManager this event is associated with.

func.fsummary: Sets the pane this event is associated with.

desc.p: Sets the pane this event is associated with.
Return: The pane this event is associated with.

func.fsummary: Sets the ID of the button clicked that triggered this event.

desc.p: Sets the ID of the button clicked that triggered this event.
Return: The ID of the button that was clicked.

func.fsummary: Cancels the action indicated by this event if canVeto/1 is true.

desc.p: Cancels the action indicated by this event if canVeto/1 is true.
Return: true if this event was vetoed.

func.fsummary: Sets whether or not this event can be vetoed.

desc.p: Sets whether or not this event can be vetoed.
Return: true if this event can be vetoed.
